verbose_text: Although the expression of Cbl-b was increased in Th1, Th2, and Th17 cells, as determined by the mean fluorescence intensity (MFI) of Cbl-b, its expression was significantly lower in Th2 cells than in Th1 and Th17 cells, suggesting that Cbl-b may play a role in Th2 cell differentiation (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
